title: Bellator 231 live and official results (6 p.m. ET)
text:
Bellator 231 takes place Friday, and you can join us for a live video stream and official results beginning at 6 p.m. ET (3 p.m. PT).

The event takes place at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn. The main card airs on Paramount and streams on DAZN following prelims on MMA Junkie.

In the main event, former UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir (18-13 MMA, 0-2 BMMA) takes on Roy Nelson (23-17 MMA, 1-3 BMMA) in a rematch from 2011. Mir won the pair’s first fight by unanimous decision.

Official Bellator 231 results include:

MAIN CARD (Paramount, DAZN 9 p.m. ET)

Frank Mir vs. Roy Nelson

Karl Albrektsson vs. Phil Davis

Jason Jackson vs. Ed Ruth

Ilara Joanne vs. Bec Rawlings

Anthony Garrett vs. Jake Hager

PRELIMINARY CARD (MMA Junkie, 6 p.m. ET)
